name: CupertinoContextMenu
desc: A full-screen modal route that opens when the [child] is long-pressed.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: A function that returns a widget to be used alternatively from [child].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget that can be "opened" with the [CupertinoContextMenu].

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: The actions that are shown in the menu.

fields.name: enableHapticFeedback
fields.desc: If true, clicking on the [CupertinoContextMenuAction]s will produce haptic feedback.
